description: If you are after a tasty but quick midweek dinner to feed the family then this is for you.
name: Easy Chicken Laksa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 bunches asian greens (buk choy, pak choy), roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large deep frypan on medium high heat. Add the laksa paste and saut√© for a couple of minutes until fragrant.
Add the coconut milk and chicken stock and bring to the boil
Add the chopped chicken and turn the heat down to a gentle simmer. Put the lid on and simmer for about 10 minutes until cooked through

While the chicken is cooking prepare the vegetables and the noodles.Place the noodles in a heatproof bowl and pour over boiling water. Let cook for about 2 minutes and drain. Rinse with cold running water to stop cooking process. Will continue cooking once soup poured over. Divide noodles between 4 bowls
Once the chicken is cooked through add the vegetables and steam for about 2 minutes until cooked to your liking. I like mine still a bit crunchy
Slice each chicken fillet into 5 pieces (if large) and brown slightly in olive oil. Remove from frying pan.
